Hi, I'm Alex :) Welcome to my digital garden, where I immortalize all the little things I write and build.


Some things I've worked on:

  • (wip) rebuilding Reddit's ad hydration pipeline
  • (wip) making Reddit saves better

  • a more aesthetic and engaging Reddit gallery

and some things I worked on a little less seriously:

  • DubMyProfessor
  • QuickTiks(video demo)
